view.message

Class MessageView

  • java.lang.Object
    • view.message.MessageView
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    java.io.Serializable
    Direct Known Subclasses:
    CommunicationMessageView, SequenceMessageView

    public abstract class MessageView
extends java.lang.Object
implements java.io.Serializable
    abstract superclass detailing a view containing the state of every message in the view, including everything positional orientated
    See Also:
    Serialized Form

        firstMessage - the firstmessage of the diagram
        partyView - the view containing all detail of the parties

                                            Message firstMessage)
        finds the message preceding the give location
        Parameters:

        firstMessage - the firstmessage of the diagram
        Returns:
        the message that is directly preceding the given location
